CategoryCaption: 2. Category 2: Remunerated employment, office, profession etc
EntrySubject: Independent lead of a review of the School Holiday Enrichment Programme (SHEP) (promoted to learners and families under the ‘Food and Fun’ brand identity) for the Welsh Government on how provision can be maximised during the summer holidays to ensure they are reaching those children and young people who need it most. The review is intended to focus on building on the success of the SHEP programme, enhancing what already works and considering how best to draw in a broader cohort of participants. A final report and recommendations to be presented to the Cabinet Secretary of Education. (SO 4.3 - Band 2: Between 5 hours and 20 hours a week)
All Senedd 2021 election expenses met by Cardiff North CLP.
Trustee - Life for African Mothers (ceased on 4 July 2023)
Patron - Ethnic Minority Welsh Women Achievement Association (EMWWAA)
